pages.text: If a $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() is holding a $(item)Totem of Undying$() in their off-hand or main-hand slot and receives otherwise fatal damage, the totem saves them from death. $(br2)It is dropped from $(l:creatures/human-evoker)$(thing)Evokers$(), which spawn in $(l:world/structures#mansion)$(thing)Woodland Mansions$() and raids.

When activated, the totem restores 1 life, removes all existing status effects and grants you: $(br)$(li)$(l:brewing/effects#regeneration)$(thing)Regeneration II$() for 45s $(li)$(l:brewing/effects#fire_resistance)$(thing)Fire Resistance$() for 40s $(li)$(l:brewing/effects#absorption)$(thing)Absorption II$() for 5s
